author: dfraser
title: The Premier League’s best crossers revealed, as Antonio Valencia, Cedric Soares and Wayne Routledge sit near the top of the pile
text:
EFL Cross kings The Premier League’s best crossers revealed, as Antonio Valencia, Cedric Soares and Wayne Routledge sit near the top of the pile 
We take a look at the top flight stars to create the most chances from the wing... and who does it with the most accuracy Revealed
